longBusinessSummary: Gala Precision Engineering Limited manufactures and sells high tensile fasteners and technical springs in India and internationally. The company offers disc, strip, coil, and spiral springs; and high stencile fasteners, such as studs, anchor bolts, cross bolts, flange nuts and hex nuts, wedge lock washers, and grip lock washers for electrical, wind turbines, off-highway vehicles, oil and gas, wind energy, hydro energy, infrastructure, railways, heavy commercial vehicles, and agricultural equipment applications. It serves its products to OEMs, tier 1, and channel partners, as well as in industries, including renewable energy, railways, automotive, electrical, and other industries. Gala Precision Engineering Limited was founded in 1989 and is based in Thane, India.
